Topic.Title: Just a heads-up: The HTML 'details' tag does not hide the details when using Internet Explorer

Posts.EditableText:
Just in case you ***really*** don't want people to see what you put in your ```<details><summary>SPOILER</summary></details>``` without clicking on it first:

If they're using Internet Explorer, they can see it without clicking. (Or that's what happens to me, at any rate. It works fine in Chrome.)

No big deal, as long as we're aware; right?
